SELECT no, title, latitude, longitude, first_image1 FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY si_gun_gu_code ORDER BY RAND()) AS rn FROM attractions WHERE latitude BETWEEN #{lat1} AND #{lat2} AND longitude BETWEEN #{lng1} AND #{lng2} ) AS grouped WHERE
rn <= 4 rn <= 3 rn <= 2 rn <= 1 rn <= 1

SELECT *, (6371000 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{lat})) * COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(longitude) - RADIANS(#{lng})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(latitude)) )) AS distance FROM attractions HAVING distance <= #{radius} ORDER BY distance ASC
